parameters.name: HealthCheckTemplateIds
parameters.description: The IDs of health check templates.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.
